title: I am genuinely curious about what everyone thinks about this.
body:
Does ARAM help you improve at all at League of Legends?
The only things I can personally think of that it COULD help with, is CS'ing under pressure, and just teamfighting.

Would I be correct in saying that?
If you do not agree, I want to know why, and why you think that, so I can better understand this community and the thoughts you people have around subjects such as this.

I hope you all have a wonderful day/night!
